table.name: vtiger_rsnprelvirement
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnprelvirement` ( `rsnprelvirementid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `dateexport` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL, `montant` DECIMAL(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `refus` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `rsnprelevements` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `commentaire` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnprelvirementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnprelvirementcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnprelvirementcf` ( `rsnprelvirementid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnprelvirementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
